title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Feb 15 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Feb 15 2022
description:
Rep. Jim Jordan joins Clay and Buck for a deep dive on the Durham revelations and what the GOP plans to do about it when they take control of the House. Plus, Rep. Jordan talks Canadian truckers, mask mandate and more. Senator Ron Johnson: Hold the media responsible for Russia hoax. Former NBC NFL reporter Michele Tafoya on her political future post-sports reporting. C&B review their Super Bowl prop bets. Jury finds NYT not liable in Sarah Palin defamation suit.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
